version_description:
Minor bugs fixed
Various stability and performance improvements

Support of latest iOS versions has been added.
Constrained time of storing private data in pasteboard which was copied from the application.
Support of third level domains.
Improved usability to fit latest iOS versions.
Support of Google Analytics.
Support of Japanese localization

* Touch ID support.
* Now available for iOS 9 devices.
* Opportunity to read a bank card number using the device camera.
* Many small bug fixes and improvements.

Auto put-in & auto sign-in for websites improved
Basic bug fixes & improvements

Auto put-in & auto sign-in for websites improved
Basic bug fixes & improvements

•Product Feedback – via feedback form and in-product rating
•License status – accurate information about your product license
•Performance Improvements – including bug fixes

Thank you for being our loyal consumer!

This update includes:
•New Notifications – in case you are manually disconnected from My Kaspersky portal
•License Status – more detailed information about your product license
•Multiple Performance Improvements – including bug fixes
•In-Product Feedback Form – rate our app and share your experience with us so we could make it even better

* For correct operation, please use the latest version of Kaspersky Password Manager on all your devices.

•A completely revamped version of the application
•Now supports iOS® 11, iPhone X and Face ID as vault unlock
•Login forms autofill in Safari for your convenience
•You can take and store pictures directly from the app
•Available new items: folders, addresses, bank cards with custom sorting
•Favorite item synchronization across all devices
•Free version storage limited to 15 entries

* For correct operation, please use the latest version of Kaspersky Password Manager on all your devices.

•You can take and store pictures directly from the app
•Available new items: folders, addresses, bank cards with custom sorting
•Favorite item synchronization across all devices
•Free version storage limited to 15 entries

* For correct operation, please use the latest version of Kaspersky Password Manager on all your devices.
• A completely revamped version of the application
• Now supports iOS® 11, iPhone X and Face ID as vault unlock
• Login forms autofill in Safari for your convenience
• You can take and store pictures directly from the app
• Available new items: folders, addresses, bank cards with custom sorting
• Favorite item synchronization across all devices
• Bugfix and performance improvement
• Free version storage limited to 15 entries

With this update the service will:
-Generate strong passwords for all your apps and online accounts
-Report on the strength of your passwords to improve your security
-Comply with the General Data Protection Regulation
-Get bug fixes and performance improvements
* Please use the latest version of Kaspersky Password Manager so that it operates correctly across all your devices.

With this update the service will:
Get bug fixes and performance improvements

Your comments helped us to improve service performance and fix some issues.

Thank you for being with us!

Your comments helped us to improve service performance and fix some issues.
Thank you for being with us!

Our new Password Autofill feature comes with this release. Plus we’ve fixed some bugs and the app is now compatible with iOS 12.

Password AutoFill makes logging in to your accounts and apps simple and secure. You don’t need to enter login & password manually – our app does it for you, saving you time and hassle.

How to set up Password AutoFill:
1. Go to ‘Settings’ – ‘Accounts & Passwords’
2. Choose ‘AutoFill Passwords’
3. Switch on ‘Kaspersky Password Manager’
Thank you for choosing Kaspersky Lab. Please feel free to leave a review!

Your comments helped us to improve service performance and fix some issues.

Make sure it’s the latest and greatest - for correct operation, please install the latest version of Kaspersky Password Manager on all your devices.

In this release, we fixed some issues and improved service performance.
Major changes from last releases:
- Passwords autofill in Web & Apps
- Multipage PDF files

Finally! What you asked us for in your reviews – it's now possible to upload not only images, but also multipage PDF files.
Scans of passports of family members, medical receipts, insurance papers and other personal digital documents - always secure, close at hand and ready to use.

For correct operation, please install the latest version of Kaspersky Password Manager on all your devices.

Thank you for choosing Kaspersky Lab. Please feel free to leave a review!

Overall performance improvements and bug fixes are waiting for you in this version.

Major changes introduced in past releases:

- Passwords autofill in Web & Apps (Settings -> Accounts & Passwords ->AutoFill Passwords)
- PDFs

This release sees the addition of a new UI language – Arabic – bringing the overall number to 20.
Also your comments helped us to improve service performance and fix some issues.
Thank you for being with us!
This version includes several important fixes to issues reported by our users. Thank you for making us better!
This version includes small changes and a few stability improvements focused on improving your product experience.
Make sure it’s the latest and greatest - for correct operation, please install the latest version of Kaspersky Password Manager on all your devices.

In this release, we fixed some issues and improved service performance.
Major changes from last releases:
- Passwords autofill in Web & Apps
- Multipage PDF files

Performance tuning. Stability improvement.
A new UI language – Czech.

We would appreciate your reviews on the App Store page!
We made improvements to our Password Generator – now you can generate strong passwords for new accounts right at the moment of adding new entries to the vault.

iOS 13 support
Share your impressions of the new KPM on the AppStore page!

Performance tuning. Stability improvement.
The most important in previous releases:
- iOS 13 support
- a new UI language – Czech
- Password Generator Improvements

We’ve added a new interface that shows you the real-time security status of your passwords. Discover if passwords you use are associated with compromised accounts so you can change them if you need to.
Plus it’s now even easier to generate and add strong new passwords from your mobile devices. Just start creating a new account and our password generator will appear to help you.

And, of course, there’s an encrypted vault for all your passwords, bank card details and digitized documents, like your passport, driver’s license, medical records, tax returns and private notes.
Overall performance improvements and bug fixes are waiting for you in this version.
This version includes several important fixes to issues reported by our users. Thank you for making us better!
Performance tuning. Stability improvement.

Now you can manage your passwords and documents without creating a My Kaspersky account. However, if you want to sync your information across all your devices – so your data is always close to hand – you will need to create an account.
Our bug-fighting team has been working overtime to find and destroy bugs, glitches and other issues. So you can rest assured that your security is even more effective.

We’ve created a tool that makes saving important documents even easier. You can now compile heavy documents into one multipage PDF in only two clicks. Plus, you can even crop and straighten the photos.

Meet quick document import! If you've just opened or edited an important document in a different app, you'll be able to quickly import it into your vault to keep it safe.
Meet quick photo import! If you've just opened or edited an important photo, you'll be able to quickly import it into your vault to keep it safe.
Convenience is key! That means no more keeping your passport scans or multipage docs as separate files. The new feature lets you combine existing scans into one multipage PDF for easy access.
Our bug-fighting team has been working overtime to find and destroy bugs, glitches and other issues. So you can rest assured that your security is even more effective.
Password Check has updates! Now we automatically group passwords - it is more convenient to view them in separate blocks and check compromised, duplicate, and weak passwords one by one block.
This version includes several important fixes to issues reported by our users. Thank you for making us better!
We are moving forward and redesigning the lists inside the Password Check! An even closer look behind each password by adding new details, statuses, and improved design.
